message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to show you this amazing product! I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
Hi Alice, thanks for the offer.  $120 is a bit higher than I'm comfortable with. I'm interested in the product but would only be able to pay $85.  Let me know what you think.

Hi Bob, thanks for your offer. I understand that $120 is a bit steep for you, but I'm still looking to make a good profit on this product. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $105.
Hi Alice, I appreciate you coming down on the price. $105 is still a little high for me. I'm willing to go up to $90. What do you say?
Hi Bob, I understand that $105 was still a bit high for you, but I'm not willing to go all the way down to $90. I'm willing to meet you halfway again and offer it to you for $100.50.
